bibl.title: New Documentary Papyri from the Fayûm.
bibl.note: From the residue from Grenfell and Hunt's excavations in the Fayûm which produced the volume Fayûm towns and their papyri. - 1. Application for registration of an ephebus. Bacchias, 2nd cent. A.D. - 2. Extract from the ephebate register. Unknown provenance, late 2nd cent. A.D. - 3. Extract from official minutes. Unknown provenance, 137 A.D. (?). - 4. Report of judicial proceedings. Unknown provenance, 2nd cent. A.D. - 5. Report of judicial proceedings. Unknown provenance, late 2nd or early 3rd cent. A.D. - 6. Petition. Bacchias, 1st or 2nd cent. A.D. - 7. Invocation for good fortune. Unknown provenance, 2nd cent. A.D. - 8-11. Minor documents.
